statements: SELECT * FROM ProductQualityControl
SELECT product_name, certification_type FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE certification_validity = TRUE
SELECT product_name, certification_date FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityControl ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT product_name, certification_type FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE certification_validity = TRUE
SELECT product_name, certification_type FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, certification_validity FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE certification_type IN ('ISO 9001', 'ISO 14001')
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityControl ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certified_products FROM ProductQualityControl WHERE certification_validity = TRUE
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, certification_status FROM products WHERE certification_status='approved';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE certification_status='pending' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_controls WHERE control_type='packaging';
SELECT control_id, control_description FROM quality_controls WHERE control_type='testing' ORDER BY control_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE certification_status = 'Certified' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE certification_status = 'Uncertified' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, certification_status FROM products WHERE certification_status IN ('Certified', 'Pending') ORDER BY product_id ASC, certification_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_controls WHERE control_type = 'Manual' AND control_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT control_id, control_type FROM quality_controls WHERE control_type = 'Automated' ORDER BY control_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, certification_status FROM products;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body, certification_expiry FROM certifications;
SELECT product_name, certification_status, certification_date FROM products WHERE certification_status = 'Pending';
SELECT qc_id, product_id, certification_id, qc_date, qc_result FROM quality_control WHERE qc_result = 1;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, certification_status FROM products WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_expiry DESC;
SELECT product_id, qc_date, qc_result FROM quality_control WHERE qc_result = TRUE;
SELECT product_id, certification_name, qc_date FROM quality_control JOIN certifications ON quality_control.certification_id = certifications.certification_id ORDER BY qc_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, certification_type FROM products;
SELECT product_name, certification_date FROM products WHERE certification_type='ISO';
SELECT certification_name, certification_agency FROM certifications;
SELECT measure_id, measure_name, description FROM quality_measures;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, certification_type, certification_date FROM products ORDER BY certification_date DESC

SELECT products.product_name, quality_measures.measure_name, quality_measures.description FROM products JOIN product_quality ON products.product_id = product_quality.product_id JOIN quality_measures ON product_quality.measure_id = quality_measures.measure_id

SELECT products.product_name, certifications.certification_name, certifications.certification_agency FROM products LEFT JOIN certifications ON products.certification_type = certifications.certification_name

SELECT products.product_name, certifications.certification_agency FROM products INNER JOIN certifications ON products.certification_type = certifications.certification_name ORDER BY products.product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Products WHERE certification='Organic';
SELECT product_id, production_date, expiration_date FROM Products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, production_date ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, m.material_name, pm.percentage FROM Products p INNER JOIN ProductMaterials pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id INNER JOIN Materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id WHERE pm.percentage > 50;
SELECT c.certification_name, c.agency, pc.product_id FROM Certifications c INNER JOIN ProductCertifications pc ON c.certification_id = pc.certification_id WHERE pc.product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE certification = 'Organic';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT product_name, certification_name, agency FROM Products JOIN ProductCertifications ON Products.product_id = ProductCertifications.product_id JOIN Certifications ON ProductCertifications.certification_id = Certifications.certification_id WHERE agency = 'FDA';

SELECT product_name, material_name, percentage FROM Products JOIN ProductMaterials ON Products.product_id = ProductMaterials.product_id JOIN Materials ON ProductMaterials.material_id = Materials.material_id WHERE sustainability_rating > 8 ORDER BY percentage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, AVG(percentage) AS avg_percentage FROM ProductMaterials GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_percentage > 50 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
